text: Balancing both work and family can be quite a hard thing to do. Go ahead and ask Jessica Alba and Jenna Devan - Tatum. Jenna and her husband Channing Tatum are parents to their daughter Everly, aged four. In addition to her acting career, Jenna has recently taken on a new role as the host of NBC â€™ s new series called World of Dance. Jessica is the co - founder of the Honest Company, and she shares daughters Haven ( aged five ) and Honor ( aged 8 ) with her husband, Cash Warren. The two women discussed balancing work with family time at a beach party celebrating the launch of their new Havaianas Mommy & Me flip - flops collection which is sponsored by the Baby2baby charity.
